summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Mission Control Dashboard Phase 2 kanban functionality. All core features working perfectly including task distribution, drag-and-drop, card expansion, and UI interactions.
passed_tests: All 5 kanban columns display correct task counts (Inbox=4, Assigned=4, In Progress=3, Review=3, Done=2)
Mission Queue header shows correct '14 active' count
All 16 task cards display title, description, assignee, timestamp, and tags correctly
Priority dots show correct colors (red for high, amber for medium, grey for low)
Task card expansion functionality works - shows assignee with role badge, priority badge, role text, created timestamp
Drag and drop between columns works - successfully moved task from Inbox to Assigned with count updates
Task tags display correctly on all cards
Card hover effects work with visual elevation change
All 10 agents correctly displayed in left panel
Top bar shows correct counts: 11 AGENTS ACTIVE and 35 TASKS IN QUEUE
Dark theme applied correctly with proper card backgrounds and readable text
Live Feed tabs functional and clickable
